users.name: Iryna Naiko

users.message: Hey there! Still deciding on whether or not to try Todos? Don't waste your time, it's an amazing app! Stay safe and plan 2021 tasks with us. P.S. Just so you won't forget how JSON data looks like ;)

users.name: Serhii Koziuk
users.description: Coach/teacher at Beetroot, Middle Front-end developer. Do your Todo with Angular.
users.message: I'll be off till the January holidays end, so please no Slack messages :D Just a few pieces of advice from me: don't forget to Google whenever you feel you're stuck, always read documentation and set your next goal. Keep polishing what you know and explore new horizons of Front-end and don't forget how JSON data looks like ;)
